panels.description: Last processed for a specified time period
panels.title: Slot

panels.description: Last processed for a specified time period
panels.title: Epoch

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
  current.balance - previous.balance AS GWei,
  current.validator_pubkey as Pubkey
FROM 
  (
    SELECT balance, validator_pubkey, status, nos_id, nos_name 
    FROM stats.validator_balances 
    WHERE 
      status != 'pending_queued' AND 
      nos_name = '${nos_name_var}' AND
      slot = ${slot_number_var}
  ) AS current
LEFT JOIN
  (
    SELECT balance, validator_pubkey, nos_id, nos_name 
    FROM stats.validator_balances 
    WHERE
      status != 'pending_queued' AND 
      nos_name = '${nos_name_var}' AND
      slot = (${slot_number_var} - ${fetch_interval_var} * 6)
  ) AS previous
ON
  previous.nos_id = current.nos_id AND 
  previous.validator_pubkey = current.validator_pubkey
ORDER BY GWei ASC
LIMIT ${limit}
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
  current.balance - previous.balance AS GWei,
  current.validator_pubkey as Pubkey
FROM 
  (
    SELECT balance, validator_pubkey, status, nos_id, nos_name 
    FROM stats.validator_balances 
    WHERE 
      status != 'pending_queued' AND 
      nos_name = 'P2P.ORG - P2P Validator' AND
      slot = 4708383
  ) AS current
LEFT JOIN
  (
    SELECT balance, validator_pubkey, nos_id, nos_name 
    FROM stats.validator_balances 
    WHERE
      status != 'pending_queued' AND 
      nos_name = 'P2P.ORG - P2P Validator' AND
      slot = (4708383 - 32 * 6)
  ) AS previous
ON
  previous.nos_id = current.nos_id AND 
  previous.validator_pubkey = current.validator_pubkey
ORDER BY GWei ASC
LIMIT 100

panels.title: Number of validators with negative delta

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
  slot_to_propose,
  validator_pubkey
FROM stats.validator_proposes
WHERE proposed = 0 AND (slot_to_propose <= ${slot_number_var} AND slot_to_propose >= (${slot_number_var} - ${fetch_interval_var} * ${epochs})) AND nos_name = '${nos_name_var}'
ORDER BY slot_to_propose DESC, validator_pubkey
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
  slot_to_propose,
  validator_pubkey
FROM stats.validator_proposes
WHERE proposed = 0 AND (slot_to_propose <= 4708511 AND slot_to_propose >= (4708511 - 32 * 6)) AND nos_name = 'P2P.ORG - P2P Validator'
ORDER BY slot_to_propose DESC, validator_pubkey

panels.title: Number of validators with missed proposals

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    epoch_participation_percent,
    validator_pubkey
FROM
    stats.validator_sync
WHERE last_slot_of_epoch = ${slot_number_var} AND epoch_participation_percent < (epoch_chain_participation_percent_avg - ${sync_participation_distance_var}) AND nos_name = '${nos_name_var}'
ORDER BY epoch_participation_percent
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    epoch_participation_percent,
    validator_pubkey
FROM
    stats.validator_sync
WHERE last_slot_of_epoch = 4708831 AND epoch_participation_percent < (epoch_chain_participation_percent_avg - 10) AND nos_name = 'Allnodes'
ORDER BY epoch_participation_percent

panels.title: Number of validators with sync participation less average

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
  count() as count_fail,
  validator_pubkey
FROM (
    SELECT
      validator_pubkey,
      nos_name
    FROM stats.validator_attestations
    WHERE attested = 0 AND 
    (slot_to_attestation <= ${slot_number_var} AND slot_to_attestation > (${slot_number_var} - ${fetch_interval_var} * ${epochs})) AND
    nos_name = '${nos_name_var}'
    ORDER BY slot_to_attestation DESC, validator_pubkey
)
GROUP BY validator_pubkey, nos_name
ORDER BY count_fail DESC, validator_pubkey
LIMIT ${limit}
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
  count() as count_fail,
  validator_pubkey
FROM (
    SELECT
      validator_pubkey,
      nos_name
    FROM stats.validator_attestations
    WHERE attested = 0 AND 
    (slot_to_attestation <= 4728415 AND slot_to_attestation > (4728415 - 32 * 3)) AND
    nos_name = 'stakefish'
    ORDER BY slot_to_attestation DESC, validator_pubkey
)
GROUP BY validator_pubkey, nos_name
ORDER BY count_fail DESC, validator_pubkey
LIMIT 100

panels.title: Number of missed attestations (${epochs} epochs range)
Number of validators with missed attestation

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
  current.balance - previous.balance AS GWei,
  current.validator_pubkey as validator_pubkey
FROM 
  (
    SELECT balance, validator_pubkey, status, nos_id, nos_name 
    FROM stats.validator_balances 
    WHERE 
      status != 'pending_queued' AND 
      nos_name = '${nos_name_var}' AND
      slot = ${slot_number_var}
  ) AS current
LEFT JOIN
  (
    SELECT balance, validator_pubkey, nos_id, nos_name 
    FROM stats.validator_balances 
    WHERE
      status != 'pending_queued' AND 
      nos_name = '${nos_name_var}' AND
      slot = (${slot_number_var} - ${fetch_interval_var} * 6)
  ) AS previous
ON
  previous.nos_id = current.nos_id AND 
  previous.validator_pubkey = current.validator_pubkey
HAVING (current.balance - previous.balance) < 0
ORDER BY GWei ASC
LIMIT ${limit}
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
  current.balance - previous.balance AS GWei,
  current.validator_pubkey as validator_pubkey
FROM 
  (
    SELECT balance, validator_pubkey, status, nos_id, nos_name 
    FROM stats.validator_balances 
    WHERE 
      status != 'pending_queued' AND 
      nos_name = 'Allnodes' AND
      slot = 4728767
  ) AS current
LEFT JOIN
  (
    SELECT balance, validator_pubkey, nos_id, nos_name 
    FROM stats.validator_balances 
    WHERE
      status != 'pending_queued' AND 
      nos_name = 'Allnodes' AND
      slot = (4728767 - 32 * 6)
  ) AS previous
ON
  previous.nos_id = current.nos_id AND 
  previous.validator_pubkey = current.validator_pubkey
HAVING (current.balance - previous.balance) < 0
ORDER BY GWei ASC
LIMIT 100

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
  slot_to_propose,
  validator_pubkey
FROM stats.validator_proposes
WHERE proposed = 0 AND (slot_to_propose <= ${slot_number_var} AND slot_to_propose >= (${slot_number_var} - ${fetch_interval_var})) AND nos_name = '${nos_name_var}'
ORDER BY slot_to_propose DESC, validator_pubkey
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
  slot_to_propose,
  validator_pubkey
FROM stats.validator_proposes
WHERE proposed = 0 AND (slot_to_propose <= 4728543 AND slot_to_propose >= (4728543 - 32)) AND nos_name = 'stakefish'
ORDER BY slot_to_propose DESC, validator_pubkey

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    status,
    validator_pubkey
FROM stats.validator_balances
WHERE (status == 'active_slashed' OR status == 'exited_slashed' OR validator_slashed == 1) and nos_name = 'Allnodes' and slot = 4728479
LIMIT 100

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
  validator_pubkey
FROM (
    SELECT
      validator_pubkey,
      count(validator_pubkey) as count_fail
    FROM stats.validator_attestations
    WHERE attested = 0 AND 
    (slot_to_attestation <= ${slot_number_var} AND slot_to_attestation > (${slot_number_var} - ${fetch_interval_var} * ${att_epochs_var})) AND
    nos_name = '${nos_name_var}'
    GROUP BY validator_pubkey
)
WHERE count_fail = ${att_epochs_var}
ORDER BY count_fail DESC, validator_pubkey
LIMIT ${limit}
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
  validator_pubkey
FROM (
    SELECT
      validator_pubkey,
      count(validator_pubkey) as count_fail
    FROM stats.validator_attestations
    WHERE attested = 0 AND 
    (slot_to_attestation <= 4728639 AND slot_to_attestation > (4728639 - 32 * 3)) AND
    nos_name = 'Stakin'
    GROUP BY validator_pubkey
)
WHERE count_fail = 3
ORDER BY count_fail DESC, validator_pubkey
LIMIT 100

panels.title: Missed attestation (${att_epochs_var} epochs in a row)

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
  validator_pubkey
FROM (
  SELECT
    validator_pubkey,
    count() AS count_fail
  FROM
    stats.validator_sync
  WHERE
    epoch_participation_percent < (epoch_chain_participation_percent_avg - ${sync_participation_distance_var}) AND
    (last_slot_of_epoch <= ${slot_number_var} AND last_slot_of_epoch > (${slot_number_var} - ${fetch_interval_var} * ${sync_epochs_var})) AND
    nos_name = '${nos_name_var}'
  GROUP BY validator_pubkey
)
WHERE count_fail = ${sync_epochs_var}
ORDER BY count_fail DESC, validator_pubkey
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
  validator_pubkey
FROM (
  SELECT
    validator_pubkey,
    count() AS count_fail
  FROM
    stats.validator_sync
  WHERE
    epoch_participation_percent < (epoch_chain_participation_percent_avg - 10) AND
    (last_slot_of_epoch <= 4728607 AND last_slot_of_epoch > (4728607 - 32 * 3)) AND
    nos_name = 'Stakin'
  GROUP BY validator_pubkey
)
WHERE count_fail = 3
ORDER BY count_fail DESC, validator_pubkey

panels.title: Bad Sync participation (${sync_epochs_var} epochs in a row)

list.description: Sync participation distance down from Blockchain average
list.label: Sync participation distance down from chain avg
list.name: sync_participation_distance_var

list.definition:
WITH epoch_range AS (
    SELECT
      ((${__to:date:seconds} - ${__from:date:seconds}) / 300)::int as val
)
SELECT IF (val = 0, 1, val) from epoch_range
list.label: Epoch range
list.name: epochs
list.query:
WITH epoch_range AS (
    SELECT
      ((${__to:date:seconds} - ${__from:date:seconds}) / 300)::int as val
)
SELECT IF (val = 0, 1, val) from epoch_range
